title: Gooseberry custard tart
ingredients: ['For the base', '125g plain flour', '1 pinch salt', '50g butter or margarine', '1 egg', '30g caster sugar', 'For the filling', '350g gooseberries', '2 tablespoons ground almonds or hazelnuts', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', 'For the topping', '1 egg', '50g caster sugar', '2 teaspooons vanilla sugar', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '50ml double cream']
